Configuration files

Main configuration files

  • asterisk.conf - the main configuration file
  • extensions.conf - The Dial Plan
  • modules.conf - which modules to load and not to load
  • features.conf - call features (transfer, parking, etc)

Channel configuration files

  • IAX2 configuration
  • SIP configuration
  • MGCP configuration
  • RTP configuration
  • DAHDI configuration
  • OSS (sound card) configuration
  • ALSA (sound card) configuration
  • Agent (proxy channel) configuration
  • MISDN Experimental ISDN BRI channel configuration
  • H.323 configuration

Application configuration files

  • Meetme (conference bridge) configuration
  • Queue system configuration
  • Voicemail configuration
  • Followme configuration

CDR configuration files

  • CDR configuration
  • Custom CDR driver configuration
  • Manager CDR driver configuration
  • ODBC CDR driver configuration
  • PostgreSQL CDR driver configuration
  • SQLite CDR driver configuration
  • FreeTDS CDR driver configuration (Microsoft SQL Server)

Miscellenaous configuration files

  • ADSI configuration
  • AMI - Manager configuration
  • Realtime configuration
  • Codec configuration
  • DUNDi configuration
  • ENUM configuration
  • Music on Hold configuration
  • Voicemail configuration
  • SQLite Resource driver configuration
